info.name: temtem_test
info.description:
Products and categories management systems with role based authentication controle.

. CRUD for products and categories.

. Authentication : login, register and refresh access token

. User management : create new user, assign a role to a user, and delete a user.

request.description: Logout for the current device. Will destroy the current refresh token.
Logout for this user from all the devices. Clear all the refresh token stored.
Request to refresh the access token by providing a valid refresh token.

item.description: Authentications api using acces and refresh token.

request.description: Deleting user, opertaion done by admin users only.
Assign role given in the body to the user with id in params. Only for admin users.
Retrieve all the DB users. Operation done by dmin users only.
